fields.summary: Android: issues displaying labels and changing properties if using textid

comments.body: textId and text properties cannot be used at the same time. One will overwrite the other. Setting textId will cause a resource lookup on that key (a key defined in Android resources), and set the label's text to the corresponding value. If this key is undefined, the text is set to an empty string. I will submit a PR with a fix such that if the key is undefined, we will not MODIFY the existing text, i.e not setting it to an empty string. Please look at http://docs.appcelerator.com/titanium/2.0/#!/api/Titanium.UI.Label for more details.
Tested with 2.0.2.v20120505151714 with Samsung Nexus S 4.0.4
Occurs with Xoom tablet running 4.0.3 using SDK 2.1.1.v20120705143056 and SDK 2.1.0GA.
Fix for this needs to backport into 2.1.1.

Environment used for verification -
Tested with Titanium SDK: 2.1.1.v20120716180600
Tested with Titanium Â Studio: 2.1.1.201207161421
Device - Android Emulator 2.3.3
Machine OS - MAC 10.7.3
